thread.section_title: Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Mini city break
thread.title_full: Mini city break - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mumsie24
title: Mini city break
text: This hotel was recommended to us and it didn't disapoint. Excellent welcome, lovely room tastefully decorated. Lovely boutique hotel right next door to Times Square. Lovely choice of continental breakfast to set you up for the day. Wine and cheese from 5pm till 7pm. Very comfy beds and excellent showers with complimentary toiletries. Definitely planning return visit. It's so has everything including location.
